findings.title: Owner can change the tax and liquidity fee
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can change router and pair addresses
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the Uniswap router and pair addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens added to liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the ability to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
